column4: if i install ubuntu without CD, is it still possible to use your current OS? :S
I mean I got windows vista (unfortunately) and downloading ubuntu.. if I download ubuntu is it still possible to use windows? or will it be "removed"?

It won't be removed unless you choose to remove it.  When you install ubuntu whether it is from cd or usb, you will be prompted with a partition utility to decide how much disk space to use (and how much to keep for Vista)
